MonsterTrait.Name: Source
MonsterTrait.Text: Tales from the Yawning Portal, page 242

MonsterTrait.Name: Amphibious
MonsterTrait.Text: The sea lion can breathe air and water.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The sea lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Swimming Leap
MonsterTrait.Text: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The sea lion makes three attacks: one bite attack and two claw attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage
